import React from "react"; import { MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardTitle, MDBCardText, MDBTooltip, MDBCardFooter, MDBIcon, MDBBtn } from "mdbreact"; const ProductCard = props => { return ( {props.product.title} Temporibus autem quibusdam et aut officiis debitis aut rerum necessitatibus saepe eveniet ut et voluptates. Temporibus autem quibusdam. Lorem Ipsum dolor ament. $ {props.product.price} props.addToCart(props.product)} >
Add to Cart
 ); }; export default ProductCard;
